post.author: 샘 권

comment.author: thomas lee
comment.content: 2 번을 하면 나중에 도움이 되는데 일단 1번이 편할겁니다

post.content:
에이전트 회사에서 파트너 십으로 비지니스 등록을 하라고 합니다. 월급날 전 까지 등록하라고 하는데요, 사이트에 들어 가 보니까 양식이 여러개 있는데, 1번 양식 아니면 5번 같은데,잘 모르겠습니다. ===================================================== http://www.cbs.gov.on.ca/mcbs/english/5JGLAZ.htm ----------------------------------------------------- Form 1 – Registration of a Sole Proprietorship/General Partnership
This form must be completed and submitted to the Companies and Personal Property Security Branch in order to register, renew, amend or cancel a business name registration for a sole proprietorship or general partnership.
Form 2 - Registration of a Business Name for a Corporation
This form is used to register, renew, amend or cancel a business name registration for a corporation.
It must be completed and submitted to the Companies and Personal Property Security Branch when a corporation wishes to carry on business under a name different from the corporation’s name. Not-for-profit corporations must also complete this form to publicly use a name other than their corporation name.
Form 5 - Registration for a Partnership/Limited Partnership new!
This form must be completed and submitted to the Companies and Personal Property Security Branch in order to register, renew, amend or cancel a business name other than the firm name for a general partnership or limited partnership.
Form 6 - Registration of an Ontario Limited Liability Partnership, Extra-provincial Limited Liability Partnership and Extra-Provincial Limited Liability Company new!
This form must be completed and submitted to the Companies and Personal Property Security Branch in order to register, renew, amend, or cancel a firm name for an Ontario limited liability partnership or extra-provincial limited liability partnership, or a company name for an extra-provincial limited liability company.
post.title: 파트너십 양식이 어느게 맞는지 혹시 아시는 분 계실까요?
